asset.author: Victorinox AG
asset.hookText:
Presenting the new Maverick
by Victorinox Swiss Army
Discover more on http://swissmyths.victorinox.com

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

The time has come to do something daring, and Victorinox Swiss Army has done just that, by reviving one of the most legendary figures in Swiss history and transporting him to the contemporary world. 
The archetypal rebel, a man of the people forced to shoot an apple off the head of his own son. Sound familiar? Probably. This time, however, our man is faced with a new challenge: he must compete with his son who is equipped with an ultra-modern crossbow. The prize? A Maverick Victorinox Swiss Army watch.

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Laurent Ulrich   Director
Michel Frutig   Production manager
Daniel Steffen   Cinematographer
Julien Humbert-Droz  Camera operator
Dedicam.tv   Arial Shots
Hanspeter Wieland  Gaffer
Patrick Becker   Sound technician
Phil Arber                  Making Of
Jehan Radwan   Make-up artist

Richard Bucher   Walter Tell
Peter Graf           Wilhelm Tell

Dino Hächler   Postproduction
Patrischa Freuler  Color correction
Michael Vescovi   Sound engineer/mastering
Phil Arber           Sound Composition


Special thanks to Rosmarie and Bruno Sager for the generous support and the beautiful shooting location.

Produced by Maybaum Film
